rows.label: tev078701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Chiromyl about weather conditions in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Chiromyl about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Chiromyl about the battle for the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Chiromyl what he intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0001
rows.name:
*fsssh* There are many exceptional voltant deposits in
Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0002
rows.name:
But when the sun sets, you could get severely burned
when it begins raining fireballs! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0003
rows.name:
And in the dead of night, strange light particles appear
that dramatically boost the area's ether. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0004
rows.name:
So you see, indigens and dripping lava aren't all there
is to worry about. *fsssh* Even weather can kill you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0005
rows.name:
If you're going there in search of voltant yourself,
tread very carefully! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0010
rows.name:
*fsssh* Lulladu seems to be back in good health,
but there's a pleasant smell about him now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's a little...voltanic, you might say. *fsssh*
The aroma is absolutely wonderful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0012
rows.name:
So now whenever I see him, I always want to
devoltanize him right there on the spot! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0013
rows.name:
Is this the emotion that you humans call love? *fsssh*
I'm not sure how much longer I can resist it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0018
rows.name: The final battle will take place in Cauldros? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Well, there's no way the Ganglion has a chance
against strong warriors like yourself! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Once you've mopped them up, you should swing by
White Phosphor Lake to pick up voltant that you
can hand out as souvenirs. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's gotten a bit easier to explore Mira now that you've
dispatched the Ganglion. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0026
rows.name:
I think I'd like to travel around the world with my
gorkwa in hand and Troylan at my side. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev078701_MSG0027
rows.name:
You've traveled all over Mira yourself, haven't you?
If you came across any good voltant deposits,
you must tell me where! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
